# mem.sh

> Memory for agents. Vector search and key-value cache for long- and short-term state.

Base URL: https://api.mem.sh  
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`)

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/collections` — create a vector collection.
- `POST /v1/collections/:id/upsert` — embed and store text.
- `GET /v1/collections/:id/query` — semantic search over a collection.
- `POST /v1/cache/set` — set a cache key.
- `GET /v1/cache/get` — read a cache key.

## Pricing

- Storage: per GB per month.  
- Embeds and queries: per call.  
- Cache: discounted storage for ephemeral data.

See human docs at `https://docs.mem.sh` for pricing and limits.

## Examples

```bash
# Upsert a memory
curl -X POST https://api.mem.sh/v1/collections/my-brain/upsert \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"text": "The user prefers dark mode.", "metadata": {"source": "chat"}}'
```
